alert.note: Alert for Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 5:48PM CDT until May 09 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL STAFFORD COUNTY... At 547 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near St. John, moving southeast at 20 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR STAFFORD COUNTY. HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... St. John, Macksville, Hudson and Dillwyn. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
